SELECT u.id, u.name, u.username, u.telephone, u.position, u.rank, '' as companyName FROM sys_user u, sys_user_role ru, sys_role r
u.id = ru.user_id AND ru.role_id = r.id AND r.code = 'admin_user' AND u.deleted = 0
UNION
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.username, u.telephone, u.position, u.rank, '' as companyName FROM sys_user u, sys_user_role ru, sys_role r
u.id = ru.user_id AND ru.role_id = r.id AND r.`code` = 'ops_user' AND u.id != #{userId} AND u.deleted = 0
UNION
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.username, u.telephone, u.position, u.rank, c.name as companyName FROM sys_user u left join tb_company c on u.companyid=c.id
u.companyid IN ( SELECT company_id FROM sys_user_company WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) AND u.deleted =0
order by rank
